DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate individual efficacy Physiotherapy Airway Clearance , investigate user experience , i.e.utility value preference .
DOC.brief_title: Study Individualized Physiotherapy Airway Clearance Cystic Fibrosis .
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis : CF Age > 18 year Amount sputum > 5 ml/60 min Wet inhalation saline/DNase/both Informed consent Respiratory failure Hemoptysis Bacteriology ( burkholderia cephacia , multiresistent pseudomonas aeruginosa , atypical mycobacteria , MRSA ) . Ongoing intravenous medication Pregnancy
